name: Catch Fire
description:
Controls

A/D is Left/Right, Space - Jump, F - Fireball.
Buttons also works.

Quick Overview

A 2.5D story-driven adventure platformer for mobiles about the hero running across the dark fantasy forest to reach the Light.

Key features:
  • Kill enemies and crash obstacles to gain Light.
  • Look around to find secret places.
  • Light all torches and lanterns to complete the level.
  • And don't forget you are alive until you have Light. It wanishes during the time.
Platforms:

The game will be avaiable on mobile devices.
